events.name: ReportGenerated
events.description: This event signifies that an analytics report has been successfully generated.

events.name: ReportViewed
events.description: Triggered when a user views an analytics report.

events.name: ReportFailed
events.description: Indicates that report generation has failed.

events.name: ReportUpdated
events.description: Captured when an existing report is updated.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: This event signifies that an analytics report has been successfully generated.

commands.name: ViewReport
commands.description: Triggered when a user views an analytics report.

commands.name: HandleReportFailure
commands.description: Indicates that report generation has failed.

commands.name: UpdateReport
commands.description: Captured when an existing report is updated.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to verify user access for viewing reports.

integrationPoints.name: DataWarehouse
integrationPoints.description: Integration to fetch data required for generating reports.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Needed to notify users when a report is generated.
